short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mark sites as dev/test/staging to avoid confusion managing multiple websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides an easy way to identify the dev, test or staging version of the websites you are working on.

Super simple to use, this extension is a must for developers or people who manage a lot of websites.
